text: , formerly known as , is a stadium in Kameoka, Kyoto Prefecture, Japan. It primarily serves as the home to Kyoto Sanga F.C. of the Japan Professional Football League (J.League). It was completed in early 2020, in time for the 2020 J.League season. The naming rights were purchased by Kyocera at 2 billion over 20 years in 2019. == References == == External links == * * * * Category:Sports venues in Kyoto Prefecture Category:Football venues in Japan Category:Rugby union stadiums in Japan Category:American football venues in Japan Category:Kyoto Sanga FC Category:Kyocera
title: Sanga Stadium by Kyocera
